DOC.brief_summary: This single center , randomize controlled trial include woman ischemic heart disease receive either self-directed stress reduction program deliver smart-phone application activity track first month ( `` early SR intervention '' `` delay SR intervention '' , respectively ) . Patients monitor 1 month application use step count via telephone email interview and/or collection screen-captured data . Baseline questionnaires repeat end one month ass primary secondary measure , time control group ( activity track ) introduce intervention program . The early SR intervention group receive new intervention encourage continue use app . Data collect additional 2 month participant group . After three-month study period , study close collection final questionnaire data .
DOC.brief_title: Stress Reduction Intervention Women With Ischemic Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: Presence ischemic heart disease define one follow within last 2 year : Positive stress test Admission ACS , PCI , CABG Typical atypical ischemic symptom within one month enrollment On stable dose antianginal medication least 2 month Able willing provide inform consent comply aspects protocol Owns smartphone ability download application stress reduction activity track Englishspeaking ( apps available language ) Planned revascularization study period Selfreported chartreviewed diagnosis psychotic disorder include schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder Current participation cardiac rehab program plan participation study period
